Three Chicks Cleaning Service

Kristen - Is a young Black College student, who dreams of becoming a mogul.
Despite growing up in South Central, she still strides to one day own
multiple businesses. “The Secret to getting ahead, is getting started.”

Mia - Is a Black entrepreneur that never stopped pursuing her dreams of
being an entrepreneur. “I want to encourage all young women,
to never be afraid to follow their dreams. You will never
know if you can make it, if you never give it a try.”

Here you'll find a description of both business owners and their personal journey/plan for the future!
